Getting Started

Sean Davis seandavi@gmail.com and Vincent J. Carey, stvjc at channing.harvard.edu

November 21, 2021

Source: vignettes/overview.Rmd
overview.Rmd

Quick start

Installation

BiocManager::install('seandavi/sars2pack')

Usage

library(sars2pack)
# documentation is in the form of gitbook site
browseURL('https://seandavi.github.io/sars2pack-book/')

Navigate to the extended online book for documentation for documentation, workflows, and example use cases along with background material.
